languages.text: "Мы уже перемолвились словечком, {name}. Мне нет больше смысла скрывать правду — Ирлиэт исчерпала свой потенциал в моих глазах. Заглянуть ей в лицо, когда она узнала истину, было бесценно".
"We have already had words, {name}. I have no reason to conceal the truth now — Yrliet has outlived her usefulness to me. Watching her face as she learned the truth was priceless."
languages.original_text: "Мы уже перемолвились словечком, {name}. Мне нет больше смысла скрывать правду — Ирлиэт исчерпала свой потенциал в моих глазах. Заглянуть ей в лицо, когда она узнала истину, было бесценно".

traits.locale_text: "We have already had words, {name}. I have no reason to conceal the truth now — Yrliet has outlived her usefulness to me. Watching her face as she learned the truth was priceless."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We have already had words, {name}. I have no reason to conceal the truth now — Yrliet has outlived her usefulness to me. Watching her face as she learned the truth was priceless."

traits.locale_text: "We have already had words, {name}. I have no reason to conceal the truth now — Yrliet has outlived her usefulness to me. Watching her face as she learned the truth was priceless."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We have already had words, {name}. I have no reason to conceal the truth now — Yrliet has outlived her usefulness to me. Watching her face as she learned the truth was priceless."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Ya hemos hablado, {name}. Ya no tengo motivos para ocultar la verdad: Yrliet ha dejado de serme útil. Ver su cara al descubrir la verdad es algo que no tiene precio».
languages.original_text: "We have already had words, {name}. I have no reason to conceal the truth now — Yrliet has outlived her usefulness to me. Watching her face as she learned the truth was priceless."

traits.locale_text: «Ya hemos hablado, {name}. Ya no tengo motivos para ocultar la verdad: Yrliet ha dejado de serme útil. Ver su cara al descubrir la verdad es algo que no tiene precio».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “我们早就谈过了，{name}。如今，我已经没有理由隐瞒事实了。对我来说，伊莉耶特已经没用了。看着她得知真相时的表情，那简直是太美妙了。”
languages.original_text: "We have already had words, {name}. I have no reason to conceal the truth now — Yrliet has outlived her usefulness to me. Watching her face as she learned the truth was priceless."

traits.locale_text: “我们早就谈过了，{name}。如今，我已经没有理由隐瞒事实了。对我来说，伊莉耶特已经没用了。看着她得知真相时的表情，那简直是太美妙了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「我々はすでに言葉を交わした仲だろ、{name}。もはや真実を隠す理由などもうどこにもない。ユリエットちゃんはもういらないよ。真実を知った時のあいつの顔は最高だったよ」
languages.original_text: "We have already had words, {name}. I have no reason to conceal the truth now — Yrliet has outlived her usefulness to me. Watching her face as she learned the truth was priceless."

traits.locale_text: 「我々はすでに言葉を交わした仲だろ、{name}。もはや真実を隠す理由などもうどこにもない。ユリエットちゃんはもういらないよ。真実を知った時のあいつの顔は最高だったよ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « C'est déjà fait, {name}. Je n'ai plus de raison de lui cacher la vérité, dans la mesure où Yrliet ne m'est plus d'aucune utilité. Vous auriez dû voir sa tête quand je lui ai tout révélé... Je vous avoue que je n'ai pas boudé mon plaisir. »
languages.original_text: "We have already had words, {name}. I have no reason to conceal the truth now — Yrliet has outlived her usefulness to me. Watching her face as she learned the truth was priceless."

traits.locale_text: « C'est déjà fait, {name}. Je n'ai plus de raison de lui cacher la vérité, dans la mesure où Yrliet ne m'est plus d'aucune utilité. Vous auriez dû voir sa tête quand je lui ai tout révélé... Je vous avoue que je n'ai pas boudé mon plaisir. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Wir haben uns bereits unterhalten, {name}. Ich habe keinen Grund mehr, die Wahrheit zu verbergen — Yrliet hat keinen Nutzen mehr für mich. Ihr Gesicht zu beobachten, als sie die Wahrheit erfahren hat, war unbezahlbar."
languages.original_text: "We have already had words, {name}. I have no reason to conceal the truth now — Yrliet has outlived her usefulness to me. Watching her face as she learned the truth was priceless."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben uns bereits unterhalten, {name}. Ich habe keinen Grund mehr, die Wahrheit zu verbergen — Yrliet hat keinen Nutzen mehr für mich. Ihr Gesicht zu beobachten, als sie die Wahrheit erfahren hat, war unbezahlbar."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "We have already had words, . I have no reason to conceal the truth now — Yrliet has outlived her usefulness to me. Watching her face as she learned the truth was priceless."

languages.text: "Konuştuk zaten {name}. Yrliet'in bir faydası kalmadığından gerçeği saklamanın da lüzumu yok. Söylediğimde yüzündeki ifadeyi bir görecektin."
languages.original_text: "We have already had words, {name}. I have no reason to conceal the truth now — Yrliet has outlived her usefulness to me. Watching her face as she learned the truth was priceless."

traits.locale_text: "Konuştuk zaten {name}. Yrliet'in bir faydası kalmadığından gerçeği saklamanın da lüzumu yok. Söylediğimde yüzündeki ifadeyi bir görecektin."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
